BPP.description: Bloembergern, Purcell and Pound spin-lattice relaxation. The function returns a R1=1/T1 in units of s^-1. The names of the variables can be defined by the user. Typical parameters values: f[1e3<1e9], a:1e9[1e6<5e9], tau:1e-9[1e-12<1e-6]

R1ISsbm.function: R1ISsbm(f, q, C, SolvMmass, density, s, tm, tr, tv, r, Delta2, Aoh)
R1ISsbm.call: R1R1ISsbm(f[1e3<1e9], q=1, C:0.78503[0.001<1], SolvMmass=1.8e-2, density=1, s=3.5, tm:1e-7[1e-10<1e-6], tr:5e-9[1e-10<1e-8, tv:1e-12[1e-12<1e-9], r=2.8ee-10, Delta2:1.3e21[1e19<1e22], Aoh=5e6)=R1ISsbm(f, q, C, SolvMmass, density, s, tm, tr, tv, r, Delta2, Aoh)
R1ISsbm.parameters: f,tv, tr, tm, r, Delta2, Aoh ,C, q, s, SolvMmass, density
